appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Awesome Stars is a chrome extension that shows you stars of repository on awesome list.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

ifYouDontHaveOneYet.message: If you don't have one yet,

opHowHotAreThoseStarsDescription.message: There are four levels for the stars of repository. Awesome Stars changes its color according to star count:

rateLimitDescription.message: For requests using Basic Authentication or OAuth (including access token), you can make up to 5,000 requests per hour.

pleaseDoNotSelectAnyScopes.message: Please DO NOT select any scopes!

whyDoYouNeedAnAccessToken.message: Why do You Need an Access Token?

whyDoYouNeedAnAccessTokenDescription2.message: . For unauthenticated requests, the rate limit allows you to make up to 60 requests per hour. Unauthenticated requests are associated with your IP address, and not the user making requests. Awesome Stars can only works properly with an access token.
